'''Belegorn''' ([[Third Age]] 2074<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, p. 204</ref> – 2204,<ref>{{App|South}}</ref> aged 130 years) was the fourth [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]].

==History==
Belegorn ruled during the period known as the [[Watchful Peace]].<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Belegorn'' is a [[Sindarin]] name. Its meaning is not glossed, but Paul Strack suggests it means "Great-tree" and is a compound of [[beleg]] ("great", "mighty", "large", "big") and [[orn]] ([tall] "tree").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-1457805237.html|articlename=S. ''Belegorn'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=28 July 2021}}</ref>
